code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 21 yr old white female parole officer presents with 3 years history of moderate cough, moderate malaise, Respiratory. pt reports moderate fever. o:Height 61 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: WNL , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes

td.content: s:22 year old white F presents with moderate malaise, moderate cough. pt also reports of moderate fever. o:Height 61 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: WNL , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes
